about_the_game:
Your climb to the top starts with the PGA TOUR 2K25 First Look!

Step up to the first tee and get started on your journey in the newest iteration of the best-selling and highest-rated golf sim franchise of the decade.* Create your custom golfer and play the tight fairways, tough bunkers and stunning bodies of water at the famous TPC Scottsdale. Make your debut drive in this First Look—then carry your progress over to the full game!**

PGA TOUR 2K25 First Look Features:

  • MyPLAYER—Build up to 3 MyPLAYERS and express yourself in the most customizable experience yet

  • The Back 9 at TPC Scottsdale—Enjoy one of the most recognizable courses on the PGA TOUR and home to the WM Phoenix Open

  • EvoSwing—New mechanics nail the feel of swinging a golf club in a way that no other title has

  • Earned Edge—Carry your MyPLAYER progress over to the full game

Take your first swing at golf greatness—DOWNLOAD NOW

*Based on average Metascore from Metacritic and NPD and GSD sales data as of February 28, 2025.

**Requires 2K Account and full game purchase on the same platform. Terms apply.

name: PGA TOUR 2K25 First Look

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take your first swing at greatness with the PGA TOUR 2K25 First Look. Build up to 3 MyPLAYERS in the most customizable experience yet. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals as you drive, chip, and putt through the TPC Scottsdale Back 9. Carry your progress to the full game!
